```{r}
# Render all project files in order

# Vector of qmd files in pipeline order
qmd_files <- c(
  "01_load.qmd",
  "02_clean.qmd",
  "03_augment.qmd",
  "04_describe.qmd",
  "05_analysis_1.qmd",
  "06_analysis_2.qmd",
  "99_proj_func.qmd"
)

# Render each file
# Requires the 'quarto' R package to be installed
for (f in qmd_files) {
  message("Rendering: ", f)
  quarto::quarto_render(f)
}
```
